mixed-citation.article-title: First records and two new species of sipunculans (Sipuncula) from the Southern Mexican Pacific

tp:treatment-sec.p: as Onchnesoma magnibatha ; type locality: NW Atlantic Ocean, 33°57′ N , 65°47′ W , 4795 m ). — Cutler & Cutler 1980: 204–205 (Pacific of Costa Rica , Peru and Nicaragua , R/V Vema , Peru , 2270–3523 m ). Questionable record in the TEP.
